Imagine someone you know full of life and spirit.
Imagine all of their energy, their joy, and their passion.
Now, imagine all of those wonderful qualities that make them shine vanish overnight.
And it's all been taken away by the bite of a tiny tick.
They've been diagnosed with Lyme disease, and they may never be the same again.
For yourself, your family, and your friends.
Please take the time to learn about Lyme.
